plot: Larry's attendance at a screening results in chaos; an unlockable bathroom door causes trouble.

As part of a deal with ABC, Larry agrees to attend a screening of a new miniseries. At the after-party, Larry finds that the bathroom doors have no locks, so he goes to use the upstairs bathroom, and the network exec's daughter asks him to cut the hair off her doll's head. He does, incurring the wrath of the exec's wife, a theater-goer, and Susie,—halo1k
